definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Hi, Jack, what leo will you take this semester?
sentences.chinese: 你好，傑克，這學期你選治口臭偏方什麼課？

sentences.english: Does irritability rhinitis pharyngitis have dietotherapy folk prescription?
sentences.chinese: 過敏性鼻炎咽炎有食療偏方嗎？

sentences.english: Heard the one about the raw onion?
sentences.chinese: 聽說過一種生洋蔥的偏方嗎？

sentences.english: The doctor has a way to treat gonorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 這位赤腳醫生有治療白濁的偏方。

sentences.english: But only recently have scientists examined whether the effect is real.
sentences.chinese: 但直到最近科學家們才研究了這個偏方效果的真實性。

sentences.english: If hand scald what folk prescription can be treated?
sentences.chinese: 如果手燙傷了有什麼偏方可以治療？

sentences.english: I think time is the best remedies can cure all skin trauma.
sentences.chinese: 縑我以爲時間是最好的偏方，可治好的全是皮外傷。

definition: a tried and tested medical prescription
good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
lit. to turn to any doctor one can find when critically ill (idiom); fig. to try anyone or anything in a crisis
every medicine has its side effect
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
